Finland eyes tougher legislation to boost borders and national securityFinland, which accuses Moscow of funnelling migrants to its eastern border, plans to amend legislation to boost border and national security and fight what it calls "instrumentalised migration," the interior ministry said on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 17:22:08 GMT EYWELVIKOFP7XHYPLFVGXYNPYA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/finland-eyes-tougher-legislation-boost-borders-national-security-2024-02-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Yulia Navalnaya, Russia's steely new opposition politician out to avenge husband's deathBefore the shock death of her husband Alexei in a grim Arctic prison last week, Yulia Navalnaya had always played down the idea she would one day take over as leader of Russia's opposition. But on Monday, she vowed to continue his fight. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 16:58:36 GMT R6YR3OFCXNJ6JMKSPPCBLZZ4ETI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/yulia-navalnaya- Russias-steely-new-opposition-politician-out-avenge-husbands-2024-02-19/Andrew Osborn世界欧洲
Magnitude 5.5 earthquake strikes northwestern Kashmir, says GFZA magnitude 5.5 earthquake struck northwestern Kashmir in Pakistan on Monday, the German Research Centre for Geosciences said. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 16:51:59 GMT 2A7PLUTJQBPRZEEHSXKBHWKRDI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/magnitude-55-earthquake-strikes-northwestern-kashmir-says-gfz-2024-02-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
US proposes UN resolution supporting temporary ceasefire in GazaThe United States has proposed a rival draft United Nations Security Council resolution that would underscore the body's "support for a temporary ceasefire in Gaza as soon as practicable," according to the text seen by Reuters on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 16:39:24 GMT TYEFNFWZNJLSHPKQ5IQKKZILOI https://www.reuters.com/world/us-proposes-un-resolution-supporting-temporary-ceasefire-gaza-2024-02-19/Michelle Nichols世界
Colombia's ELN would respond with force to any break in ceasefire, says leaderColombia's National Liberation Army (ELN) rebels will respond with military force to any break in their ceasefire with the government, leader Antonio Garcia told Reuters, predicting that the current stage of peace talks will end in 2025. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 16:26:03 GMT 2QW3Z764RRM2TFKRN35L4JKB6Y https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/colombias-eln-would-respond-with-force-any-break-ceasefire-says-leader-2024-02-19/Luis Jaime Acosta世界美洲
Two air strikes hit Lebanon's Ghaziyeh, 60 km north of Israel border, witnesses sayAt least two air strikes hit near the town of Ghaziyeh on Lebanon's coast around 60 km (37 miles) north of the border with Israel on Monday, according to witnesses in the area. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 16:20:41 GMT ZEQF26RJPVPUTDHC7UJVDPDXGQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/two-air-strikes-hit-lebanons-ghaziyeh-60-km-north-israel-border-witnesses-say-2024-02-19/Reuters世界中东
DRC conflict: Why is fighting intensifying and can it threaten regional stability?Violent clashes have escalated between Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC)'s army and Rwandan-backed M23 Tutsi-led rebels in eastern Congo, killing scores and displacing hundreds of thousands. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 16:10:26 GMT 7KSDKN6QGNIYTNMQVM3Y4X6SXE https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/why-fighting-is-flaring-eastern-congo-throne-regional-stability-2024-02-19/Ange Kasongo世界非洲
After retreat, Ukraine digs in to repel new Russian attacks in eastUkraine's military said on Monday its troops had taken up new defensive positions in the east after retreating from the captured town of Avdiivka and were repelling Russian attempts to develop the offensive thrust. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 16:02:03 GMT NSCSLVCK75OEJDAUD7MH3RQJ2Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/after-retreat-ukraine-digs-repel-new- Russian-attacks-east-2024-02-19/Pavel Polityuk, Tom Balmforth世界欧洲
At least a dozen dead in northern Mexico shootout near Texas borderAt least 12 people were killed in a shootout with security forces in northern Mexico near the border with the United States, Mexican authorities said on Sunday night. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 15:34:09 GMT 2IOOEDB355IC5PM6TR6S4QDFNA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/least-dozen-dead-northern-mexico-shootout-near-texas-border-2024-02-19/Reuters世界美洲
Diapers instead of bridal gowns: Gaza tailors adapt to wartime needsTwo stylised images of women wearing glamorous wedding dresses adorn the front of a tailoring workshop in Rafah, but the workers inside have switched to making diapers, one of the many necessities that have become impossible to find in wartime Gaza. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 15:28:51 GMT PWOESM36SJPIBF3FBJHECWQXMU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/diapers-instead-bridal-gowns-gaza-tailors-adapt-wartime-needs-2024-02-19/Mohammed Salem世界中东
Britain's Rwanda asylum plan raises deep concerns: UN rights chiefBritain's revived plan to send asylum seekers to Rwanda would drastically strip back courts' ability to scrutinise decisions and risks dealing a "serious blow to human rights", the United Nations rights chief said on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 13:30:26 GMT A4BNPDSPXBIV5LITFEOTTZQRCE https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/britains-rwanda-asylum-plan-raises-deep-concerns-un-rights-chief-2024-02-19/Reuters世界英国
